name: Cookie
directions: Warm up the Milk in the pot, turning the dial to wait for the *poof* then place warmed milk into the Cauldron.
Toss the sugar straight into the Cauldron, no prep work is required.
Brown the flour in the skillet, tossing it up into the air frequently so you don't burn it. Wait for the poof, then place the browned flower into the cauldron.

name: Basic Noodles
directions: Cook Milk in the pot, then place into cauldron.
Fry Flour in the skillet, then place into cauldron 2 times.

name: Basic Carrot Noodles
directions: Boil Noodles in pot until soft, then transfer to cauldron.
Chop Carrot into 6 pieces, saut√© in skillet until soft and slightly browned, then add to cauldron.

name: Basil Noodles
directions: Boil Noodles in pot until soft, then move into cauldron.
Chop each basil into 7 pieces, fry in skillet then move into cauldron.

name: Basil Mushroom Noodles
directions: Cook Basil Noodles in the pot, then place into cauldron.
Chop Common Mushroom into 4 pieces, fry in the skillet, then place into cauldron 2 times.

name: Cilantro Noodles
directions: Cook Basic Noodles in the pot, then place into cauldron.
Chop Cilantro into 8 pieces, fry in the skillet, then place into cauldron 2 times.

name: Orange Cheesecake Smoothie
directions: Cook Milk in pot, then place into cauldron.
Chop Blood Orange into 5 pieces, then place into cauldron 2 times.
Chop Durian into 7 pieces, then place into cauldron.

name: Sunset Dragon Smoothie
directions: Cook Milk in the pot, then place into cauldron.
Chop Dragonfruit into 8 pieces, cook in the pot, then place into cauldron.
Chop Blood Orange into 6 pieces, then place into cauldron 2 times.

name: Orange Rabbit Smoothie
directions: Cook Milk in pot until warm, then transfer to cauldron.
Cut Oranges into 5 pieces, then toss into cauldron.
Chop Carrot into 6 pieces, boil to soften, then toss into cauldron.

name: Orange Creamsicle Smoothie
directions: Cook Milk in the pot, then place into cauldron.
Chop Blood Orange into 7 pieces, then place into cauldron 2 times.

name: Peach Smoothie
directions: Cook Milk in the pot, then place into cauldron.
Chop Peach into 6 pieces, cook in the pot, then place into cauldron 2 times.

name: Apple Juice
directions: Fry Sugar in the skillet, then place into cauldron.
Chop Apple into 6 pieces, cook in the pot, then place into cauldron 2 times.

name: Dragonfruit Smoothie
directions: Cook Milk in pot until warm, then transfer to cauldron.
Cut each Dragonfruit into 6 pieces, then soften in a pot. Toss into Cauldron when done.

name: Rosemary Noodles
directions: Cook Basic Noodles in the pot, then place into cauldron.
Chop Rosemary into 7 pieces, fry in the skillet, then place into cauldron 2 times.

name: Flaming Pineapple Smoothie
directions: Cook Milk in the pot, then place into cauldron.
Chop Pineapple into 10 pieces, fry in the skillet, then place into cauldron.
Chop Dragonfruit into 5 pieces, then place into cauldron.
